||newline||  ||newline||  ||newline|| The yard of the West Ham shelter of the Salvation Army is a cold place on a January morning ||period||  The building itself ||come||  an old warehouse ||come|| ||come||  but with a pulley rigged over it for hoisting sacks ||period||  Those who come from this central gable end into the yard have the gateway leading to the street on their left ||come||  with a
